mcidentitymobs.config.title: Mob Identity Config
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.female_sca:
Enable different model size for female entities.
§7If enabled, females can be either smaller or larger than males
§7(depending on other settings / mod integration).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.colored_na:
Color entity names based on gender.
§7Blue for male, pink for female.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.usePlayerM:
If enabled, villagers will use the player model (wide/slim based on gender).
Requires game restart to take effect.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.use_defaul: Use the built‑in name database (over 5,000 English names).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.restore_de: Reset custom names to the original mod defaults.
mcidentitymobs.tooltip.change_slider:
Female spawn chance.
§70.0 = always male, 1.0 = always female.
mcidentitymobs.tooltip.force_name: Force assign the generated name to the entity's CustomName tag.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.male_color:
Hex color code for male entity names.
§7Example: #5555FF
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.female_col:
Hex color code for female entity names.
§7Example: #FF55FF
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.preview: Click to choose from color presets.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.jade_icons: Show gender icons in Jade / WTHIT mod tooltips.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.jade_unkno: Display an icon for asexual or hermaphroditic entities next to their names.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.iconOffset:
Vertical position adjustment for Jade gender icons.
§7Range: -10 to 10, default: -3.5.
§7Negative values move up, positive move down.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.jade.zombi: Display the remaining time before a zombie returns to its original form.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.zombies:
List of entities that can infect others.
§7When one of these lands a killing blow, the target may transform.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.chanceInf:
Base chance for a mob to transform when killed.
§7• Easy: 50% of value
§7• Normal: 100% of value
§7• Hard: 200% of value
§7• Peaceful: 0%
§7Value is automatically clamped between 0–100%.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.timeMinMul:
Lower bound of the random cure time multiplier.
§7• Easy: value × 0.5
§7• Normal: value
§7• Hard: value
§7Final cure time = base time × random(min, max).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.timeMaxMul:
Upper bound of the random cure time multiplier.
§7• Easy: value
§7• Normal: value
§7• Hard: value × 2.0
§7Final cure time = base time × random(min, max).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.vanilla_hu: Enable gender assignment for vanilla humanoid mobs (villagers, witches, etc.).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.custom_hum: Enable gender assignment for custom humanoid mobs added by other mods.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.vanilla_no: Enable gender assignment for vanilla non‑humanoid mobs (pigs, cows, etc.).
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.custom_non: Enable gender assignment for custom non‑humanoid mobs added by other mods.
mcidentitymobs.config.tooltip.can_be_inf:
Defines which entities can be infected and their zombie counterpart.
§7Each entry can also specify cure requirements and conversion time.
mcidentitymobs.tooltip.curable: Can be cured by the specified effect and/or item.
mcidentitymobs.tooltip.time:
Duration of the cure process in ticks (20 ticks = 1 sec).
§7Default: 3600 ticks (3 min).
